General.Name: GPM Metals Inc
General.Description: GPM Metals Inc., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a zinc focused exploration company. The company also explores for lead and silver deposits. It holds interest in the Walker Gossan project covering an area of approximately 176,000 hectares located in the McArthur Basin Mining District, Australia; and the 100% claims interest in the Pasco Project located in the Department of Pasco, Peru. The company was formerly known as Guyana Precious Metals Inc. and changed its name to GPM Metals Inc. in August 2013. GPM Metals Inc. was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 141 Adelaide Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 3L5
